title: MidWest Homes for Pets Hamster Cage | Awesome Arcade Hamster Home (White) | 18.11 x 11.61 x 21.26 Inch
descriptions:
MidWest Homes for Pets Hamster Cage | Awesome Arcade Hamster Home (White)

Give your small pet a fun, enriching habitat with the Awesome Arcade Hamster Home. Designed for comfort and play, this white, multi-level cage combines an engaging vertical playground with a deep, easy-to-clean base—perfect for burrowing and nesting.

Key features:
- Multi-level play space: Built-in ramps and platforms encourage natural exploration and exercise.
- Deep base for bedding: Extra depth helps contain litter and supports healthy burrowing behavior.
- Easy access: Top door access and a removable upper cover make feeding, cleaning, and bonding simple.
- Modular design: Includes connector pieces and is compatible with standard play tubes for easy expansion.
- Complete starter setup: Comes with an exercise wheel, water bottle, food bowl, nesting nook, and interior play tubes.
- Tool-free assembly: Quick, hassle-free setup right out of the box.

Specifications:
- Color: White
- Dimensions: 18.11 in L x 11.61 in W x 21.26 in H
- Weight: 6.1 lb
- Warranty: 1-year manufacturer’s warranty

Why you’ll love it:
This thoughtfully designed habitat maximizes vertical space without taking over your tabletop. The deep base keeps mess to a minimum, while the included accessories get you started immediately. With modular connectors, you can expand as your pet’s playground grows—no tools required.

What’s in the box:
- Exercise wheel
- Water bottle
- Food bowl
- Nesting nook
- Interior play tubes

Ideal for: Hamsters and similar small pets that enjoy climbing, tunneling, and interactive environments.
